repositories.name: linux-kernel-module-cheat
repositories.description: Run one command, get a QEMU Buildroot BusyBox virtual machine built from source with several minimal Linux kernel 4.14 module development example tutorials with GDB and KGDB step debugging and minimal educational hardware models.
